revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Verizon |model=Jetpack |revision=(MHS291LVW) |upc=0958923502418 |asin=B00GBAO2ES,B00E9WBLGM,B00MYL95HM |price=300 |est_release_date= |fcc_date=02/20/2013 |manuf_country=Korea |is_manuf=No |manuf=Pantech |manuf_model=MHS291L |manuf_rev=VWQ |availability=now |type=4G LTE router, mobile hotspot |fcc_id=JYCORBIT |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=MDM9615 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=512 MiB |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=MT29C4G48MAYBAAKS-5 WT |ram1=256 MiB |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT29C4G48MAYBAAKS-5 WT |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR6003X;AR6003X-BC2B; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none=true |flags=LCD display |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid=Verizon-291LVW-XXXX |default_ssid_regex=^Verizon-291LVW-[A-F0-9]{4}$ |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass=''randomly generated'' |oui=2C:30:48, D0:57:85 }} {{TagLine|Jetpack 4G LTE Mobile Hotspot}} :[http://www.pantechusa.com/modems/jetpack-4g-lte-mobile-hotspot/ Product page] (''Pantech'') {{•}} [https://www.verizonwireless.com/support/jetpack-4g-lte-mobile-hotspot-mhs291l/ Support page] (''Verizon'')
===FCC info=== Per the FCC photos... *''Micron'' MT29C4G48MAYBAAKS-5 WT (''FBGA'' code: JW739) :NAND + LPDRAM MCP chip ([http://www.elnec.com/device/Micron/MT29C4G48MAYBAAKS-x+WT+%5BTFBGA137%5D/ 4Gbit Flash, 2Gbit RAM]) *The Wi-Fi IC is an ''[[Atheros]]'' AR6003 (AR6003X) :The exact P/N ''appears'' to be AR6003X-BC2B :It is using an additional ''SiGe'' RF IC
*The device is also using the following.. :''[[Avago]]'' ACPM-7251 Multi-band (Cellular) PA module *Battery: ''Pantech'' BTR291B (Li-ion, 3.8V, 4040/3900mAh, 15.4/14.8Wh) :Cell manuf. in China, unit manuf. in Korea by ''Pantech'' ([https://www.amazon.com/Pantech-Jetpack-BTR291B-Battery-Original/dp/B00MYL95HM B00MYL95HM])
The default SSID format stated is ''Verizon-291LVW-XXXX Secure''.. :however, there are now hits for this SSID format in '''WiGLE'''<small> ''Verizon-291LVW-XXXX'' (''XXXX'' = last four [upper-case] hex digits of the BSSID) does :seem to be used (and it is shown as the proper SSID in the final [released] manual)</small> OUIs used for the device are per '''WiGLE''' data for the ''Verizon-291LVW-XXXX''..
===Specifications=== Additional specifications, per ''Pantech'', follow... *Display: 1.32" OLED screen (128x96 pixel) *Battery capacity: 4040mAh typ., 3900mAh min. *Dimensions (DxWxH): [[Dimensions::0.72" x 2.44" x 3.62"]] *Weight: [[Weight::4.97 oz]]
===Reviews=== *[https://mobitech.com.ua/reviews/obzor-mobilnogo-3g-routera-pantech-mhs291lvw ''Pantech MHS291L'' on '''MobiTech'''] :CPU: [[Qualcomm]] MDM9615 ([https://www.qualcomm.com/news/releases/2011/02/14/qualcomm-introduces-28nm-mass-market-ltedc-hspa-chipsets-mobile-broadband PR]) :Wi-Fi: 802.11a/b/g/n (2.4/5GHz) :CDMA (1x EV-DO Rev.A): 800/1900 MHz :GSM/GPRS/EDGE: 850/900/1800/1900 MHz :UMTS/WCDMA: 850/1900/2100 MHz :LTE: 700/AWS 1700/2100 MHz
===See also=== :[https://www.verizonwireless.com/internet-devices/verizon/ Verizon Internet Devices] *[[Verizon Jetpack 4G LTE Mobile Hotspot (AC791LVWQ)]] • [https://www.verizonwireless.com/internet-devices/verizon-jetpack-4g-lte-mobile-hotspot-ac791l/ PPage] *[[Verizon Jetpack 4G LTE Mobile Hotspot MiFi (7730L)]] • [https://www.verizonwireless.com/internet-devices/verizon-jetpack-mifi-7730l/ PPage] *[[Verizon Jetpack 4G LTE Mobile Hotspot MiFi (6620L)]] • [http://www.serviceslist.uk/CustomerServiceVerizon/verizon-jetpack-customer-service MDM9625] *[[Verizon Jetpack 4G LTE Mobile Hotspot MiFi (5510L)]] • *[[Verizon Jetpack 4G LTE Mobile Hotspot MiFi (4620L)]] •
